thread.section_title: Tix.nl Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Tix.nl | tix.nl | 4 van 50
thread.title: Sharon Bloomfield

author: Sharon Bloomfield
title: Sharon Bloomfield
text: I made a reservation but filled in my email address incorrectly, so did not receive my confirmation email etc. I rang Tix and got a very helpful young sounding lady on the line who was able to find the error and correct it without any fuss or recrimination. I'm totally satisfied. If there is a gripe, and it is with most help lines, I did have to wait quite a while before I got anyone on the line. The service I received - once connected - during the call was excellent.
